docs.title: FSL
docs.description:
FSL is a comprehensive library of analysis tools for FMRI, MRI and diffusion brain imaging data. It runs on macOS (Intel and M1/M2/M3), Linux, and Windows via the Windows Subsystem for Linux, and is very easy to install. Most of the tools can be run both from the command line and as GUIs ("point-and-click" graphical user interfaces). To quote the relevant references for FSL tools you should look in the individual tools' manual pages, and also please reference one or more of the FSL overview papers:

M.W. Woolrich, S. Jbabdi, B. Patenaude, M. Chappell, S. Makni, T. Behrens, C. Beckmann, M. Jenkinson, S.M. Smith. Bayesian analysis of neuroimaging data in FSL. NeuroImage, 45:S173-86, 2009

S.M. Smith, M. Jenkinson, M.W. Woolrich, C.F. Beckmann, T.E.J. Behrens, H. Johansen-Berg, P.R. Bannister, M. De Luca, I. Drobnjak, D.E. Flitney, R. Niazy, J. Saunders, J. Vickers, Y. Zhang, N. De Stefano, J.M. Brady, and P.M. Matthews. Advances in functional and structural MR image analysis and implementation as FSL. NeuroImage, 23(S1):208-19, 2004

M. Jenkinson, C.F. Beckmann, T.E. Behrens, M.W. Woolrich, S.M. Smith. FSL. NeuroImage, 62:782-90, 2012

docs.title: Out file
docs.description: Registered output file.

docs.title: Out matrix file
docs.description: Output affine matrix in 4x4 asciii format.
FLIRT (FMRIB's Linear Image Registration Tool) is a fully automated robust and accurate tool for linear (affine) intra- and inter-modal brain image registration.
authors: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford

docs.title: In file
docs.description: Input file.

docs.title: Reference
docs.description: Reference file.

docs.title: Out file
docs.description: Registered output file.

docs.title: Out matrix file
docs.description: Output affine matrix in 4x4 asciii format.

docs.title: Angle rep
docs.description: 'quaternion' or 'euler'. Representation of rotation angles.

docs.title: Apply isoxfm
docs.description: As applyxfm but forces isotropic resampling.

docs.title: Apply xfm
docs.description: Apply transformation supplied by in_matrix_file or uses_qform to use the affine matrix stored in the reference header.

docs.title: Bbrslope
docs.description: Value of bbr slope.

docs.title: Bbrtype
docs.description: 'signed' or 'global_abs' or 'local_abs'. Type of bbr cost function: signed [default], global_abs, local_abs.

docs.title: Bgvalue
docs.description: Use specified background value for points outside fov.

docs.title: Bins
docs.description: Number of histogram bins.

docs.title: Coarse search
docs.description: Coarse search delta angle.

docs.title: Cost
docs.description: 'mutualinfo' or 'corratio' or 'normcorr' or 'normmi' or 'leastsq' or 'labeldiff' or 'bbr'. Cost function.

docs.title: Cost func
docs.description: 'mutualinfo' or 'corratio' or 'normcorr' or 'normmi' or 'leastsq' or 'labeldiff' or 'bbr'. Cost function.

docs.title: Datatype
docs.description: 'char' or 'short' or 'int' or 'float' or 'double'. Force output data type.

docs.title: Display init
docs.description: Display initial matrix.

docs.title: Dof
docs.description: Number of transform degrees of freedom.

docs.title: Echospacing
docs.description: Value of epi echo spacing - units of seconds.

docs.title: Fieldmap
docs.description: Fieldmap image in rads/s - must be already registered to the reference image.

docs.title: Fieldmapmask
docs.description: Mask for fieldmap image.

docs.title: Fine search
docs.description: Fine search delta angle.

docs.title: Force scaling
docs.description: Force rescaling even for low-res images.

docs.title: In matrix file
docs.description: Input 4x4 affine matrix.

docs.title: In weight
docs.description: File for input weighting volume.

docs.title: Interp
docs.description: 'trilinear' or 'nearestneighbour' or 'sinc' or 'spline'. Final interpolation method used in reslicing.

docs.title: Min sampling
docs.description: Set minimum voxel dimension for sampling.

docs.title: No clamp
docs.description: Do not use intensity clamping.

docs.title: No resample
docs.description: Do not change input sampling.

docs.title: No resample blur
docs.description: Do not use blurring on downsampling.

docs.title: No search
docs.description: Set all angular searches to ranges 0 to 0.

docs.title: Padding size
docs.description: For applyxfm: interpolates outside image by size.

docs.title: Pedir
docs.description: Phase encode direction of epi - 1/2/3=x/y/z & -1/-2/-3=-x/-y/-z.

docs.title: Ref weight
docs.description: File for reference weighting volume.

docs.title: Rigid2d
docs.description: Use 2d rigid body mode - ignores dof.

docs.title: Schedule
docs.description: Replaces default schedule.

docs.title: Searchr x
docs.description: Search angles along x-axis, in degrees.

docs.title: Searchr y
docs.description: Search angles along y-axis, in degrees.

docs.title: Searchr z
docs.description: Search angles along z-axis, in degrees.

docs.title: Sinc width
docs.description: Full-width in voxels.

docs.title: Sinc window
docs.description: 'rectangular' or 'hanning' or 'blackman'. Sinc window.

docs.title: Uses qform
docs.description: Initialize using sform or qform.

docs.title: Verbose
docs.description: Verbose mode, 0 is least.

docs.title: Wm seg
docs.description: White matter segmentation volume needed by bbr cost function.

docs.title: Wmcoords
docs.description: White matter boundary coordinates for bbr cost function.

docs.title: Wmnorms
docs.description: White matter boundary normals for bbr cost function.
FLIRT (FMRIB's Linear Image Registration Tool) is a fully automated robust and accurate tool for linear (affine) intra- and inter-modal brain image registration.
authors: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
